txt.en: 'Goodness me! I can't possibly keep up with the incredible demand on the festival goods all by myself. Everything seems to be running out all at once, but the suppliers for the Faire are all over the Shire!\n\n'Will you help me, [placeholder]? Perhaps I can give you a little incentive to make these runs as speedy as can be....'

With the Farmers Faire being such a great success, many of the food-stores are running perilously low. Trips to various farms will be necessary in order to restock.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>
Help Sperling Took complete a restocking task
Sperling Took awaits assistance in Bywater. He offers a number of tasks for you to complete.\n\nYou should help Sperling Took with a restocking task.
